column2: Victory and glory be with me!
My holy water can cleanse the heart~
Never allow any dirt to exist!
column4: 絕不容許任何污垢的存在!

column2: No one can escape my hunt
column4: 沒有人能逃出我的狩獵

column2: Even enemies should be treated equally
column4: 即使是敵人也要平等對待

column2: The sound made when sawing the body is not ordinary.~
column4: 鋸開身體時發出的聲音可不是一般的好聽唷~

column2: Ah~ I don’t want to work anymore…
My breasts can bring you comfort~
column4: 我的胸部可給你帶來慰藉噢~

column2: I hope there won’t be another war

column4: 我的信仰就是這雙拳頭!

column2: Let me guide you ~ Lost Lamb
column4: 讓我引導你們吧~迷途的羔羊

column2: Aha~ Lu Ge will never fail~
column4: 啊哈~Lu Ge是不會失敗的~

column2: Eternal rest is the best blessing…
column4: 永遠的安息才是最好的祝福…

column2: Do you want to eat and rest first? Or me~
